Package br.com.concepting.framework.controller

Class SystemController

  • java.lang.Object
    • br.com.concepting.framework.controller.SystemController
  • public class SystemController
extends java.lang.Object
    Class responsible for control the requests of the system.
    Since:
    1.0.0

        name - String that contains the identifier.
        value - String that contains the value.

        value - String that contains the value.

      • getAttribute

        public <T> T getAttribute​(java.lang.String attributeId,
                          ScopeType scopeType)
        Returns the value of an attribute that is stored in a specific scope. The attribute identifier must be defined like following: <attribute-name>.<child-attribute-name>.<child-attribute-name> E.g.: loginSession.user.name
        Type Parameters:
        T - Class that defines the attribute value.
        Parameters:
        attributeId - String that contains the attribute identifier.
        scopeType - Instance that contains the type of the scope.
        Returns:
        Instance that contains the attribute value.

      • setAttribute

        public <T> void setAttribute​(java.lang.String attributeId,
                             T attributeValue,
                             ScopeType scopeType)
        Defines the value of an attribute that is stored in a specific scope. The attribute identifier must be defined like following: <attribute-name>.<child-attribute-name>.<child-attribute-name> E.g.: loginSession.user.name
        Type Parameters:
        T - Class that defines the attribute value.
        Parameters:
        attributeId - String that contains the attribute identifier.
        attributeValue - Instance that contains the attribute value.
        scopeType - Instance that contains the type of the scope.
